name: Andrew McKinnon
text: Cheese did not cover sauce. Sauce was very thick, toppings were sparse and no where near enough. Felt like I was eating a tomato sauce pizza. Will not return to this location. Will drive the extra 5 minutes to the good pizza hut

name: Lindsey Graham
text: I absolutely would not feed my dog let alone my family the garbage they made for us. It was the cheesy bite pizza. There was barely any cheese in these so called bites and they were rock hard. I could throw tge pizza like a throwing star ‚Ä¶More

text: Not even going to try them, too many bad reviews, thanks for the heads up!

name: James Folkert
text: Ordered delivery at 4:50. The estimated delivery time given was 20-30 minutes. Even on the receipt it said it would be delivered by 5:15. Our order didn't arrive until 6. 45 minutes later than expected. Also, I was initially given the wrong ‚Ä¶More

name: Andrew Kail
text: Consistently have issues ordering pizzas from here. Several times takes 2 hours to deliver when an estimated 20 minutes is given. Also sent the wrong order and we had to drive out to get it worked out because their phones were down. And ‚Ä¶More

name: Nancy Morrison
text: Pizza was ready when they said it would be. It was hot and order was right. The people who worked there were friendly.  Clean very nice store. Price was great too.

name: Ronald Silton
text: Great chain restaurant pizza place with a good buffet at lunchtime.

name: Brad Pickenheim
text: Ordered from here several times and they are always slow, but today they cancelled my order and never notified me. Go to Marco's instead.

name: Keyifa George
text: I was overcharged and my order was wrong,  they made no attempt to correct the problem or give me a refund. I had to go out of my way to get my money back and get the information to report them! DO NOT EAT HERE HORRIBLE SERVICE AND MANAGEMENT!

name: amy hardee
text: I ordered the pzone supreme today. It had very little ingredients in it.  The sausage peppers and onions would fill a few tablespoons.  No taste and very doughy.  Very disappointed in the quality of food.

name: Damian Robinson
text: I love Pizza Hut and their awesome tasting pizzas but today I went in today to pick up a pizza and they were gonna charge me $16 just to pick up and that‚Äôs the almost the same price they charge to deliver. They are taxing way to hard and ripping people off.

name: Jake Key
text: The customer service here is better than most. Great store manager who teaches his employees well. Would recommend

name: #3rdbeepracinggarage
text: The guy answered the phone sounded to be of special needs and couldn't speak English every well, I dont suggest phoning in a pick up order. 1 star very bad experience

name: Linda Taylor
text: I ordered a pizza online delivered at 8:50 pm last evening. After an hour and a half I called to check on order. I was told it was on the way & the driver had one delivery before me. The place is 1.4 miles from me. Called later & they were closed. NEVER got pizza.

name: Ace Washington
text: Very clean carry out establishment.  They take there time to prepare delicious, hot and cheesy pizzas.  I will be returning!!üçïüëåüëå

text: This place is teally bad they had very little cheese on the cheesey bite pizza and could not get ahold of them for a refund and the lady from the phone service put in the refund instead of the store.I would never order anything from them

name: Marissa Hicks
text: My sister has had bad times with this place, but first of all, they never came to my door when they said they did, second, they got my order wrong and they were late. i ordered a Dr pepper which came in a bottle, we didnt see if it was open ‚Ä¶More

text: Pizza is always awesome!! Literally the only pizza hut in the area I go to. Staff is extremely friendly and professional. 10/10 stars if I could give it!

text: I hardly want to give them a 1 star. This is the third time we've ordered from pizza hut. Each time 30 minutes outside of the delivery time estimated for you. No way. Pizza may be good. But not that good.

text: This is the last and final chance. If you want your order wrong every single time, then order from here. Not only do the manage to screw something up every single time, they manage to outdo themselves each time, as if their goal is to get ‚Ä¶More

name: Leola Collier
text: My pizza is always good and ready when I go to pick it up!!! I use to go to the other Pizza Hut locations and had swore that I would never eat Pizza Hut pizzas again.  But after eating the Veggie pizza at this location, I am hooked! I order very often from this location only. I highly recommend this location!!!

name: Cathy Barker
text: Fresh and hot

name: Layla Creed
text: Worse location!! I waited 2 hours on my Pizza to be delivered, called up there 7 times no one picked up to even let me know the status of my delivery. I had to go up there to get my order...while I was there the phone was steady ringing no one ever stopped to pick it up. Worse service ever!

name: olivia Stone
text: We have been waiting on our pizza to be delivered for literally 3 hours and it's still not here. Every time we have called they say it will be 30 mins. We are cancelling our order now!

name: Mike M
text: Don't waist your time and money at this place, go to pizza joint or mellow in aiken. We came into an empty restaurant with a large party to order seven pies and waited an hour to get the kid's pies. I know pizza only takes 4-17 minutes to ‚Ä¶More

name: stephen shipley
text: ZERO STARS .Worst place ever. late, cold, smashed pizza. 3 orders in a row. They have been my go to pizza place for 25 yrs. Thanks to this store they will get zero of my money from now on. Screw you Aiken pizza hut, I hope this place closes.

name: Char'Rae Bethke
text: Waited and picked up our pizza instead of a cole delivered pizza. It was terrible dried out and cold. Will go to Marco's for pick up or delivery both very good. No more pizza huts for us, unless we go to Pizza hut in North Augusta still good pizza and wonderful employees.

name: Gray Mare Adventures
text: Great, helpful service. Pizza beautifully made in the amount of time I was told.  Delicious!

text: Really great service! Quick, the pizza was good, staff was really nice!
